creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: black ground fabric; red, green, blue and white leaf print lining; embroidered with geometric edging and central back designs, predominately in fuchsia; trim at bottom of white and red beads; metallic gold trim around arms and upper back; embellished overall with buttons, mirrors, metal discs and diamond-shaped pendants, white beads and sequins; large pink bead button closure
dimension: 15 5/8 x 13 1/2 in. (39.69 x 34.29 cm) (including beading at hem)
medium: Cotton, silk, metallic threads, metal, plastic, beads, sequins
title: Child's vest
